rukus.text: The Merciful-to-all
taught the Qur'an
created man
taught him articulate speech
The sun and the moon run on precise calculations
The stars and the trees submit to Him
The skies, He raised high and has established the balance
That you may not transgress in the balance
but weigh with justice, and do not violate the balance
The earth, He laid out for all living creatures
In it are fruits, and date-palms in clusters
And grains on flourishing stems and fragrant plants
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
He created Humankind from dry clay, ringing like pottery
And He created the jinn from a fusion of fire
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
He is Lord of the two sunrises and Lord of the two sunsets
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
He merged the two seas, converging together
with a barrier they do not over run between them
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
From out of both comes pearl and coral
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
His are all floating objects, raised above the sea like mountain peaks
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
